```{r}
#| label: redirects
#| echo: false
#| include: false
posts <- list.dirs(
  path = 'posts',
  full.names = FALSE,
  recursive = FALSE
)

# extract the slugs
existing_posts <- paste0('/posts', gsub('^.*_', '', posts))
redirects <- paste0(existing_posts, ' /post/', posts)
writeLines(redirects, file.path('_site', '_redirects'))
```
